data.title: Film Music Reporter
data.meta_description: Singer/songwriter Aimee has contributed an original song to the new romantic comedy My Favorite Girlfriend. The track, entitled Where Love Is..., is written by
data.text: Singer/songwriter Aimee has contributed an original song to the new romantic comedy My Favorite Girlfriend. The track, entitled Where Love Is…, is written by herself and the film’s composer Alex Geringas (Woody Woodpecker, I Heart Arlo, TrollsTopia) and is now available to stream/download on all major digital music platforms, including Amazon. Also listen to the full song below. My Favorite Girlfriend is written and directed by Amanda Raymond and stars Bonnie Piesse and Tyler Johnson. The movie, which revolves around a mismatched couple and the multiple personalities that come between them, is being released in select theaters today by Saban Films before coming out on VOD this coming Tuesday, August 9.
